name: Stellar Journey
description:
A simple project me and my partner started with the idea of finishing it in a single month by working 1 hour per day.

The plan was good, but it didn't account for the unpredictableness of life.

Now, two months later, it is completed! 

Hop on your rocket and go on an adventure! 

Try to make it to the last planet and back, and share with me your score!

Design & development - Radi Salamat - radidar.artstation.com

Art & UX design - Andrea Jovanovic - andreajovanovic.artstation.com

Audio - Casual Game Sounds, RPG & Dungeon Sounds, Epidemic Sound, Absolute Space & Sci-Fi Vol.1, Sci-Fi Music Pack 1
